participant_1.background: when i grow up i want to be a dog. i like to look at blocks and sing about letters. i like to eat chocolate candy. i like to talk but people have a hard time understanding.

participant_2.background: i walk three miles every day. i love disneyland and mickey mouse. i love to spend time with my family. my favorite way to relax is to read a book. i am a baby delivery nurse.
